author: sarowe
msg: Switch from LWP::Simple to wget invocation for downloading JIRA project info - because the JIRA URL uses the https: protocol, LWP::Simple requires the LWP::Protocol::https module, which is not included by default in many Perl installations, e.g. Debian-based distros
